items.title: Wall Street’s recession odds are starting to look like a coin flip as Trump refuses to back down on his trade war
items.description: "If we would continue down this road of what would be more disruptive, business-unfriendly policies, I think the risks on that recession front would g...

items.title: Baidu releases reasoning AI model to take on DeepSeek
items.description: The Ernie X1 model by China’s internet search leader works similarly to DeepSeek R1.

items.title: China maps out plan to raise incomes and boost consumption
items.description: Other measures include stabilizing the stock and real estate markets, and offering incentives to raise the country’s birth rate.

items.title: New Prime Minister Mark Carney vows Canada will ‘never, ever’ be part of the US as he seeks alliances in Europe
items.description: Carney has said he’s ready to meet with Trump if he shows respect for Canadian sovereignty.

items.title: Education Department staff cuts could limit options for families of kids with disabilities
items.description: Filing a complaint with the Education Department has long been an option for families who can't afford a lawyer.
